title: Emigrating to Spain After Brexit - The Top 7 Facts You Need to Know
description:
For many years the process of emigrating to Spain and starting a new life under the Mediterranean sun has been a well-trodden path for British expats.
In fact, such is the number of British expats currently living in Spain (around 310,000 on the latest estimate) it is almost regarded as a rite of passage for those approaching early retirement. Make no doubt about it. Brexit has thrown a spanner in the works.
